name: Please Switch
description:
Controls

My complex movement controls are as follows:

"W" - Move upwards

"S" - Move downwards

Aim

Along your journey to survive for the greatest amount of time as possible, you will be switching "States", between what I've very creatively called "Hot" and "Cold" where you must match your character state to the obstacles in your path to survive!

Description

Please Switch is a simple game made for the 48 Hour August Jam, however I scrabbled to make this small game in 5 hours as I missed the start, and my first game idea wasn't very fun at all. 

Hope you enjoy! Also, check out my other games on the Google Play Store: https://play.google.com/store/apps/dev?id=6059541739059708213
